```{r}
#Daten laden
happyscore <- read.csv2("./datasets/Happiness_Score_Countries.csv")

#Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(colorspace)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggforce)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#Nur Europa
happyscore_EU <- filter(happyscore, name %in% c("Germany", "France",  "United Kingdom", "Spain", "Italy", "Poland", "Sweden", "Netherlands", "Finland", "Czech Republic", "Norway", "Austria", "Switzerland", "Hungary", "Denmark", "Romania", "Portugal", "Belgium", "Ireland", "Slovakia", "Greece", "Estonia", "Croatia", "Slovenia", "Bulgaria", "Lithuania", "Latvia", "Cyprus", "Luxembourg", "Malta"))

#Nur Europa & nur 2018
happyscore_EU_2018 <- filter(happyscore_EU, year == 2018)

#Vergleich Happiness Score nach LÃ¤ndern (Europa) 
ggplot(happyscore_EU_2018, aes(happiness.score, fct_reorder(name, happiness.score))) +
  geom_col()

#Happiness Score Deutschland von 2005-2020
happyscore_DE <- filter(happyscore, name == "Germany")

ggplot(happyscore_DE) +
  aes(x = year, y = happiness.score) +
  geom_line()

ggplot(happyscore_EU) +
  aes(x = year, y = happiness.score, color = name) +
  geom_point()
```
